Summary Note:
Díaz Morales Vázquez and the RM were introduced at a charity run in Copenhagen. They ran side by side and discussed their philanthropic goals, which led to a meaningful collaboration.
Díaz Morales Vázquez is a 38 year old Biotech Startup Founder from Denmark.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Díaz Morales Vázquez has been happily married to Cristina since 2014. Their children are named Ruiz, Díaz and Hernández.
Education Background:
Díaz finished secondary school at IES Ginés Martínez de Aranda Albacete in 2004.
Díaz graduated from University of Valencia in 2010, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Díaz Morales Vázquez is a 38 year old and comes from Denmark.
In 2010, Díaz Morales Vázquez started working as a Research Scientist at  Zealand Pharma A/S, marking the beginning of his successful career.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Biotech Startup Founder at Genmab A/S in 2013, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 100000 DKK.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Randers and Teruel, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 6140000 DKK from his late grandfather, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2019.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
